Data: 1.50pm News just in, Australia have won the toss and will bat. What Ricky Ponting has to say about it I'll let you know soon.
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run a bit of swing at 125kph, straightening down the line and it's defended first up on the front foot
Vaas to Hayden, no run much of the same, another tight delivery on a good length and straight, Hayden looks to muscle an on-drive along the floor towards mid-on but takes the power out of the shot
Vaas to Hayden, no run arced away from the left hander, who looks to use the width with a cover drive
Vaas to Hayden, FOUR runs a curve away on off, just a touch full and Hayden pushes it hard through straight mid-on and it rolls away
Vaas to Hayden, no run the offcutter perhaps slipping down the leg-side after pitching on off, Hayden was tucked up there and trapped
Vaas to Hayden, 1 run more curve, and a touch short, driven on the back foot to the covers and they shuffle through a single
Malinga to Hayden, no run some good carry through first up, sliding down off across the left hander who elects to leave the decent length delivery
Malinga to Hayden, no run down off again, tighter now, though and it straightens through to Sangakkara

Malinga to Hayden, FOUR runs chopped an inside edge down after Malinga found some extra bounce outside off and he was lucky to survive as the ball crashed past leg stick. A big lack of footwork noted also
Malinga to Hayden, no run the ball came on well again and Hayden makes sure to defend back do the bowler this timem, squeezing it out on the back foot
Malinga to Hayden, 1 run a quick dab-and-run into the covers, testing out the fielders there
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run good delivery, pitched just outside off, rose sharply while nipping back into the left hander who adjusts to defend down on the back foot
Vaas to Hayden, no run oh, plenty of seam movement away from the left hander as it pitched wide of off and had him chasing the ball with a cut
Vaas to Hayden, 2 runs swing in on middle and it's turned well off the thigh to midwicket
Vaas to Hayden, no run another straightish delivery, defended down on the front foot

Vaas to Hayden, FOUR runs and the bowler got away with one, as Hayden strode outside off, but not far enough over to the swinging delivery and sent what would have been a comfortable catch to first slip
Vaas to Hayden, 1 run on middle, and aiming towards leg, Hayden gets over the ball and drives strongly in front of midwicket
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run straightish delivery, on off, a touch short and defended off the back foot
Malinga to Hayden, no run that one nipped back just a touch and is defended
Malinga to Hayden, no run shoots through the channel, licks through well outside off and so the batsman is quick to shoulder arms
Malinga to Hayden, no run now then, nipped back in from just outside off and was ever so close as Hayden shouldered arms
Malinga to Hayden, no run an easy leave this time, the ball pushed wider down the channel
Malinga to Hayden, 2 runs squeezed off the legs to midwicket and some comfortable running results
Malinga to Hayden, 1 run outside off, enough room to be driven back through mid-on
Vaas to Hayden, no run outside off, short one, defended back down
Vaas to Hayden, 1 run defended on the front foot this time and they squeeze out a run
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run an easy single, hit again to the covers, and they ease through
Vaas to Hayden, 1 run rolled up there on off, a single to mid-on, and it's too easy for Sri Lanka's liking - they just jogged that through, Jayasuriya's throw missing the sticks
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run nipped back in from outside off, defended into the covers
Malinga to Hayden, 1 run outside off, looked to cut that but ended up cut-driving into the covers for an easy single
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run waited for one on off, turned off the legs in front of square
Malinga to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off, wide, a deliberate aerial flash through gully that at first looks accidental, but was well placed
Malinga to Hayden, 2 runs wide again, outside off, smashed through extra cover, Amerasinghe gets a hand on it at wide mid-off
Malinga to Hayden, no run very straight, very true, rises a touch and asks to be defended back down on the back foot. The request is met
Malinga to Hayden, no run straight, short and the batsman thinks first about sweeping, then adjusts to defend back down
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run an easy single into the covers

Vaas to Hayden, 2 runs the most entertaining shot so far doesn't even get a four as it plugs in the deep, Hayden smashes it off the toes up and over through cow corner. They should have got three, but he initially took only two
Vaas to Hayden, 2 runs a driven through mid-off this time
Vaas to Hayden, no run good response, tight on middle, and defended on the front foot
Vaas to Hayden, no run tucks him on to the back foot in front of middle and leg, worked just on the on-side
Vaas to Hayden, 1 run outside off, squeezed to point
Malinga to Hayden, no run right up there and defended on the front foot
Malinga to Hayden, 2 runs turned off the legs through square
Malinga to Hayden, 1 run outside off, crashes to point, good running from Hayden to make it through
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run outside off, turned into short midwicket, and they don't run through
Malinga to Gilchrist, SIX runs hello, massive. Super shot, the ball taken off the toes and lifted high and in front of midwicket and it goes five rows back
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run defended on the back foot
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hayden, no run right up there on off, pushed into the covers
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hayden, no run pushed across the right hander, left alone
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hayden, no run outside off, played on the front foot
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hayden, no run again pushed across the right hander, Amerasinghe has started his third ODI well, having also bowled well against India earlier this week
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hayden, FOUR runs a full toss and a simple cover drive driven into the ground and then bounces up
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hayden, no run outside off, driven into the covers
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run on leg, turned into short midwicket, straight to the fielder and there's no run
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run swung past the right hander, defended towards mid-off
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run on middle and leg, driven out to mid-on
Malinga to Gilchrist, no run on leg, pushed right up there, and turned to square leg
Malinga to Gilchrist, 1 run short ball, on off, and cut late off the back foot through gully
Malinga to Hayden, no run pushed right up there on off, defended off the back foot into the covers
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, no run great ball down off, Gilchrist tempted into fishing outside off at one which goes slightly away from him
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, no run got hold of it this time, outside off, driven hard to the covers where it's picked up well
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, no run pushed across him at 141.5kph, driven to the covers
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, 1 run good length, tight outside off, turned off the legs towards square, didn't get hold of it
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hayden, FOUR runs a powerful blow, down the pitch, hits the ball on the up over the bowler's head and found so much muscle to do so
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hayden, no run stars outside his crease again, and yorks himself coming down to look to drive
Malinga to Gilchrist, 1 run down the track and plays on the front foot
Malinga to Hayden, no run on leg, looks to turn it round, but the ball's too quick on him
Malinga to Hayden, no run outside off, guided to the covers
Malinga to Hayden, no run slung in straight, defended on the back foot dead in front
Malinga to Hayden, 1 run a touch of room outside off, cut to point where Dilshan tidies up and delivers back in
Malinga to Gilchrist, 1 run pushed up there on off, driven back straight but without the power
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, FOUR runs outside off, overpitched, and you can't bowl there to him, Gilchrist launches a full-blooded cover drive that shoots along the floor
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, no run on leg, driven out to mid-on

MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, FOUR runs outside off again, the length is wrong once more and Gilchrist goes for another crashing shot, wider over extra cover this time. It plugs deep but has enough legs to run on
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, 1 run on leg, too short, and Gilchrist pulls it up through midwicket and it's picked up inside the boundary

MKDI Amerasinghe to Hayden, OUT Amerasinghe breaks through as Hayden, batting out of his crease, once more, comes down the track and is cramped up straight, mishitting on the up out to short midwicket
MKDI Amerasinghe to Ponting, no run right up there in the blockhole on off and defended back forward
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run bowled well, up there, defended on the front foot
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run stands and defends on the back foot
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run nipped back in from outside off on to middle, chopped into short midwicket
Vaas to Ponting, no run banana-ed away from the right hander on a good length, and Ponting was content to leave
Vaas to Ponting, no run pitches on middle, the ball nips out from off, and pushed into the covers
Vaas to Ponting, no run Ponting waits as the ball comes in at 129.2kph, moves out, and worked off the back foot to point
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, no run outside off, pushed to the covers
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, 2 runs short ball and Gilchrist nearly departed in a Hayden-stylee way, turning and pulling just wide of long-on
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, 1 run he's living dangerously, turned off the hips with a pull, tucked up a bit and the ball miscues up but safe
MKDI Amerasinghe to Ponting, no run outside off, pushed into the ground straight back towards the bowler
MKDI Amerasinghe to Ponting, no run outside off, driven back out to straight mid-off
MKDI Amerasinghe to Ponting, no run right up there, full and straight, defended forward. A shout for lb, but iur was going down leg
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run outside off, worked into short midwicket
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off, tried to work it forward

Vaas to Ponting, 1 run ooh, very well bowled, cutting away off the seam as it ptiched outside off, the edge was just wide of the diving first slip where Jayawardene made an excellent effort. He couldn't have done more
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run worked forward to mid-on
Vaas to Ponting, no run pushed across him on off, defended on the front foot
Vaas to Ponting, no run slowish delivery at 131.2kph, on off, defended on the front foot
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, 1 run round the wicket, up there on off, worked to short midwicket
MKDI Amerasinghe to Ponting, FOUR runs full delivery on off, overpitched, driven on the up through mid-on
MKDI Amerasinghe to Ponting, 1 run right up there outside off, driven out to mid-on
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, no run outside off, defended back down on the back foot
MKDI Amerasinghe to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off, worked to mid-on, winged back in the non-striker's
MKDI Amerasinghe to Ponting, no run up there, straight, played back forward
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run on leg, turned to midwicket, they look for two but stick with one
Vaas to Ponting, no run the ball surprises him and keeps low, defended back well down on the back foot
Vaas to Ponting, 1 run pushed forward to mid-off for a quick single
Vaas to Gilchrist, FOUR runs turned well off the legs through backward square
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run nipped back in from outside off in front of off, played to short midwicket
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run short outside off, played down through gully off the back foot
Murali to Ponting, 1 run Murali's roared in, on off, worked out to short midwicket
Murali to Gilchrist, no run good loop, floated in on middle, the batsman gets right over it to defence
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run on leg, turned into short midwicket
Murali to Ponting, 1 run outside off, turns in to middle and defended on the front foot
Murali to Gilchrist, no run pushed up there and defended
Murali to Gilchrist, no run Gilchrist leaps on the touch of room, rocking on to the backfoot and cutting out
Vaas to Ponting, no run pushed across off and defended on the backfoot
Vaas to Ponting, no run outside off, Ponting waits for the bounce which doesn't come and drives off the back foot and the bottom of his bat
Vaas to Ponting, no run played well on the front foot
Vaas to Ponting, no run right up there, squeezed out to point on the crouch
Vaas to Ponting, OUT Jayawardene picks up a sharp chance at first slip, Ponting opening the face and running down to his opposing captain who snaps it up low, good catch
Vaas to Clarke, no run across the right hander, tight and a good length, worked into the covers
Murali to Gilchrist, no run up there on the front foot, played forward
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run steals a quick single into the covers
Murali to Clarke, no run good loop and length on off, defended forward tightly
Murali to Clarke, no run on off, turned into short square
Murali to Clarke, 1 run right up there on off, driven out to the on-side
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run waits on off for one which pitches on a good length and is driven to the covers
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, no run turns on to leg and moved out to the leg-side
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 1 run drags it down a touch, Gilchrist waits for one which doesn't carry on, pulled round with control to midwicket
Kapugedera to Clarke, no run turned back from off towards middle, Clarke looks to work the ball through midwicket
Kapugedera to Clarke, no run slowish ball at 113.8kph, good angle and length, dipping outside off and defended on the front foot. No room to manoeuvre there at all
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run turned off the legs through the 45
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, no run round the wicket, moves in to the left hander from outside off, defended back into the covers
Murali to Clarke, no run defended back into the ground on off
Murali to Clarke, no run loop in from outside off, turned on to middle, worked out to midwicket
Murali to Clarke, 1 run defended on the front foot
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run on off, a touch short, swept hard through square leg
Murali to Clarke, SIX runs down the track, overpitched, and lifted high over long-on
Murali to Clarke, 1 run on off, turned away from the right hander, cut out to point
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 1 run right up there, driven to mid-on
Kapugedera to Clarke, no run nipped back in from a tight line outside off, worked into the covers
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run pushed in on leg, and worked out well off the toes to midwicket
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 1 run wide outside off, waited and cut down on it through gully
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run low full toss on leg, played down over the ball to work it through midwicket
Murali to Clarke, 1 run on leg, jabbed out through midwicket
Murali to Gilchrist, no run waited on the back foot, the ball kept low and was defended down on the back foot
Murali to Gilchrist, no run driven back out to long-on
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run turned off the legs to midwicket, Kapugedera tidies up well
Murali to Clarke, no run good turn, Clarke rocks back to try to open up the off-side but it came back sharply
Murali to Clarke, 2 runs driven out through mid-off and there's some good running
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 1 run on leg, pulled round off the back foot behind square
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run nipped back in from outside off, driven forward
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off, plenty of width, cut out
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run on off, overpitched a touch, driven out from off to mid-on
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, no run outside off, beaten by the slower ball, the batsman through the ball before it came on
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 1 run swivelled round this time
Murali to Clarke, 1 run outside off, cut off the backfoot to point
Murali to Gilchrist, 2 runs outside off, cut through gully now
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run outside off, swept behind square
Murali to Clarke, no run outside off, nipped back defended back
Murali to Clarke, no run more defence
Murali to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track and driven to mid-on
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run low full toss on leg, pushed off the legs to midwicket
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 2 runs tucked off the legs and it flew off the top of his bat deep to Murali
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 1 run right up there on off, well flighted, driven out to mid-on
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run outside off, cut back down and that was well played
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 1 run angled too far down leg, turned off the legs square
Kapugedera to Clarke, no run turned in and pushed back out
Murali to Gilchrist, no run rips past the outside edge this time
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run waited and worked into the covers, Gilchrist setting off immediately for a sharp single

Murali to Clarke, no run turned back in from outside off on to middle, worked out without much power to leg gully where it's fired back over to Murali who's ready to take the bails but the batsman was back in
Murali to Clarke, no run on off, pushed forward in a defensive manner
Murali to Clarke, 2 runs outside off and Clarke goes on the attack, down on one knee and slog sweeping out to Malinga whose hat flies off as he runs round to return
Murali to Clarke, no run outside off, good length, defended on the back foot
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, no run right up there on off, played forward defensively
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, no run slower ball, well bowled, causing questions in the mind of Gilchrist who decides to play out away from his body, almost at the last minute
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, no run the ball nips back in from outside off, Gilchrist waits and is patient again in defence

Kapugedera to Gilchrist, OUT a long and loud appeal for one which dips low and Gilchrist plays across the line. It hit him in front of middle, having come in from off, and would have gone on to hit the stumps
Kapugedera to Symonds, 1 run driven out wide of mid-on to get off the mark immediately
Kapugedera to Clarke, no run worked out to the cover region
Murali to Symonds, no run right up there on off, defended forward
Murali to Symonds, no run outside off, turns back in, pushed back out
Murali to Symonds, 1 run outside off, played out to point
Murali to Clarke, 1 run driven out to mid-on
Murali to Symonds, no run nipped back in from outside off, defended quietly in front
Murali to Symonds, 1 run extra loop, so much so it's a full toss, got away with it as the batsman drove out to mid-on
Kapugedera to Symonds, no run right up there outside off, defended again
Kapugedera to Symonds, 2 runs on leg, turned off the legs through midwicket
Kapugedera to Symonds, 2 runs outside off, run down to third man. A good throw from Murali could have possibly had Symonds there. It was referred but there was only ever one outcome there
Kapugedera to Symonds, 2 runs on leg, turned off the toes behind square, good running to come back for two but Sangakkara appeals in vain for the run-out. It's not even referred this time
Kapugedera to Symonds, 2 runs outside off, cut down late down to third man
Kapugedera to Symonds, no run nipped back in from outside off, straightens and Symonds waits to defend back down
Vaas to Clarke, no run good return ball again, Clarke reaching out outside his off stump to drive away from his body, and that bounced over his bat
Vaas to Clarke, no run outside off, again Clarke leans out, defends this time
Vaas to Clarke, no run outside off across the right hander who leaves it through
Vaas to Clarke, 1 run outside off, driven hard through the covers and Tharanga is the man who tidies up
Vaas to Symonds, no run pushed across the right hander who waits and defends into the covers off the back foot
Vaas to Symonds, no run outside off, good length, lets it go through
Kapugedera to Clarke, no run outside off, full delivery, worked to mid-on
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run pushed right up there, driven back out to mid-off
Kapugedera to Symonds, 1 run dragged down a touch slower, driven back out to mid-off
Kapugedera to Clarke, 2 runs pushed down the leg side, turned round in front of square
Kapugedera to Clarke, 2 runs on middle, back away and cut hard back out to the covers
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run on off, defended on the back foot
Vaas to Clarke, no run outside off, pushed into the covers
Vaas to Clarke, 1 run up there on off, played back down this time
Vaas to Symonds, no run outside off, wide, Symonds goes for the drive outside off, and Sangakkara does well to stop it, standing up
Vaas to Symonds, OUT gone this time, Symonds flashes hard to extra cover where Kapugedera takes a great catch at head height, and it was travelling
Vaas to Hussey, no run outside off, pushed forward first up
Vaas to Hussey, no run pushed forward, Hussey's keen to run through and get off the mark, but Clarke wisely sends him back
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run driven out to mid-on
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run great ball on off and a great length, there's no run there, Clarke defends accordingly
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 wide down leg and that's the first extra of the innings! It's been a great bowling and fielding display in that regard
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run back on the money, defended on the front foot on off
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run nipped back in from outside off, that one kept very low and Clarke did well to watch the ball on to the bat, adjusting at the last second to play it down
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run outside off, again had to stab a bit low at it
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run outside off, slightly short, played off the back foot into the covers
Kapugedera to Clarke, 2 runs overpitched slightly just outside off, and well pushed out straight towards mid-on, and some good running brings up the two
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run on leg, driven out to straight mid-on once more
Kapugedera to Hussey, no run nipped back in from just outside off, kept very low indeed and Hussey defended onthe back foot in front of his shins
Kapugedera to Hussey, 1 run outside off, Hussey waits and opens the face, running it gently down to third man
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run slower delivery, it just hangs in the air as it flights down on leg, the ball brushed off the pads behind square
Kapugedera to Hussey, no run nipped back in from outside off, pushed to short midwicket

MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, FOUR runs outside off, cut hard through third man off the toe of the bat, not the place he was aiming for (that was the covers) and he moved back behind the stumps to do so
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run recovers well to place it right on off, the batsman defending behind it
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run outside off, Clarke squares up and runs an inside edge down through third man
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run pushed across the left hander from over the wicket, Hussey pushes forward and they run a quick single
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, FOUR runs on off, Clarke backs away, exposing his stumps and the ball's driven hard through the covers, just past the fielder there to bring up a well-timed fifty
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run outside off, pushed into the covers
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run on middle, defended on the front foot, but pushed far enough to pick up the single
Kapugedera to Hussey, FOUR runs overpitched on off and with enough width to carry past cover and beat the fielders. Scorching timing and even better placement
Kapugedera to Hussey, 1 run bent back in to the left hander, who drives out to the covers
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run backs away once more, and drives out to cover where Jayawardene tidies up
Kapugedera to Hussey, 1 run turned in on the legs, pushed back out off the shins just in front of square
Kapugedera to Clarke, 2 runs down leg, Clarke comes forwad and pushes out to midwicket where a misfield from Murali allows the second
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run on middle, that one at 137.3kph, defended tidily forward in front

MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run pushed across the left hander from over the wicket, took some pace and dropped it down to 130 from his usual 138-mark, and beat Hussey who was lucky not to get a top edge on that
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 2 runs waited and pushed down to third man where somehow they manage to get back for two. Some quick sprinting there

MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, OUT short ball, wide outside off and Hussey comes out of his crease, and cuts back into the hands of Dilshan at backward point. It was straight to him, but stroked hard so a good catch
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 1 run Hopes squares up to that one for his first ball and plays it down towards third man
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run nipped back in outside off, short, and played back down off the back foot
Murali to Clarke, 1 run outside off, flayed hard out in front of midwicket
Murali to Hopes, 1 run outside off and played round in front of square leg this time, where Jayasuriya - still with the chin plaster on - tidies up
Murali to Clarke, 1 run played forward this time
Murali to Hopes, no run a long way across his stumps, doosra pitches on leg and would have gone wide so the appeal is turned down
Murali to Hopes, no run outside off, the doosra again spinning away, turned to short midwicket
Murali to Hopes, no run down on one knee, looks to cut to the covers
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run swept round through the 45, and they sensibly decide not to go for the second
Malinga to Hopes, 3 runs short outside off and a great shot from Hopes, waiting outside off and pulling it from face height round in front of midwicket
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run backs well away bhind the stumps to cut into the covers - the ball following him - and bring up the 200
Malinga to Hopes, no run outside off, stands on the toes, and cuts to the covers
Malinga to Hopes, 2 runs outside off, driven out hard through the covers
Malinga to Hopes, 2 runs driven hard to mid-on and they run well
Murali to Clarke, 1 run outside off, worked into the covers
Murali to Hopes, no run worked forward this time
Murali to Hopes, no run comes right out of the crease and on the off-side, defended on the front foot
Murali to Hopes, 1 run outside off, swept on the front foot out to deep midwicket
Murali to Clarke, 2 runs flighted up there on off, driven out straight to long-off
Murali to Clarke, 1 run plays it out square to finish his spell
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run outside off, driven out
Malinga to Hopes, 1 run slower ball, Hopes saw it coming and delayed the shot, lofting the bowler with a cut-pull and didn't get hold of it, the ball dropping just wide of mid-off
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run comes down and works out to the covers
Malinga to Hopes, 1 run on middle, driven out to mid-off
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run dragged short and lofted over mid-on
Malinga to Hopes, 5 wide the slider, slid full and wide down leg
Malinga to Hopes, 1 run outside off, the batsman comes out, drives to the covers
Murali to Gilchrist, 2 runs driven out to mid-on off the toes
Murali to Gilchrist, no run outside off, Gilchrist played for the turn which didn't come, and so he was forced to reach out further to cut down into the ground
Murali to Gilchrist, no run outside off, Gilchrist cautious again, coming out and pushing into the covers
Murali to Gilchrist, 1 run right on middle, Gilchrist drives out to mid-on for a well-thought-out fifty and he celebrates with a raised bat
Murali to Clarke, no run nipped back in from outside off, looks to turnb it down through midwicket
Murali to Clarke, 1 run gets hold of the knock to midwicket this time
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run on off, worked out to midwicket
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 1 run turned back in from outside off, pushed back out on the front foot
Kapugedera to Clarke, no run outside off, turned away, cut out to point
Kapugedera to Clarke, 1 run nips back in but enough length to work to midwicket
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, 2 runs the ball almost plugged on the track then on middle, forcing Gilchrist to improvise a flick up and round through the 45
Kapugedera to Gilchrist, no run defended this time
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, FOUR runs on off, a touch short, and Hopes doesn't quite get the timing but there's enough muscle to work that in front of midwicket
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 2 runs down the track and turned off the legs behind square
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 1 run down the track to meet a full toss, driven wide of long-on, doesn't connect again but there's enough power on it for them to run up a single
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run worked round to fine leg
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, FOUR runs down the track, backed away from the ball but had to stretch out again and gets the top edge which flies through third man
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 1 run up there on leg, dug out to midwicket
Malinga to Hopes, 1 leg bye way down leg and Hopes got some bat on it with a late bat, Sangakkara did well to stop the ball and it was given as leg-byes, to Sanga's disgust
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run yorker, up there, dug back out to the covers
Malinga to Hopes, 1 run on off, Hopes timed it really well to Murali at wide mid-on, who runs round well, lunges forward and the ball bobbles up and hits him straight in the front teeth
Malinga to Clarke, 2 runs hip-high full toss controlled into midwicket and they cheekily scamper two
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run outside off, the ball pushed right up there, tucks it off his toes into midwicket

Malinga to Hopes, 1 run on middle and leg, the batsman backs away leaving his stumps exposed - this has been favoured by Australia - and has to reach back out to cut through the covers, his hand coming off the bat as he did so
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 2 runs easy drive out
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 1 run down the track outside off, took his eyes off that one, his head facing towards the leg-side as the ball splays up towards mid-off
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run driven out forward again
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 3 runs down the track outside off, but backed away again to work out behind point, Jayasuriya fielding inside the rope
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run Clarke down the track and walks over a push off the legs to midwicket
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 1 leg bye way down leg, rapping Hopes on the back leg and they shuffle out a single, Amerasinghe's lone appeal goes in vain
Malinga to Hopes, 1 run backs away and is way behind the stumps when he works it back out through midwicket
Malinga to Clarke, 2 runs Clarke wanders across his stumps and works it out to midwicket
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run Clarke shuffles back and then shuffles across, taking the ball on off and working out to the covers
Malinga to Hopes, OUT outside off, swing away, and the batsman comes out of his crease, but it's scooped to backward point where Dilshan does the honours
Malinga to Lee, no run on leg, Lee looks to scramble the single as the ball goes back to Sangakkara who rolls it back to the stumps and misses
Malinga to Lee, no run another dot ball, Lee playing forward, Malinga taking it and mock-shies at the non-striker's stumps

Australia have reached a very competitive 253 on a slowish track at the SCG, then. Sri Lanka bowled well in patches, and their extra count was impressive for the most part, but good manipulation from the batsmen in working the singles

Welcome back for Sri Lanka's reply. Their openers, Jayasuriya and Tharanga, are at the crease. Lee has the ball for Australia. Jayasuriya's record at the SCG is formidable. Lee is in excellent form. 254 is the target. So far the rain

Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run thats a cracker to start off with! Short of a length, extra bounce, lovely seam position, good carry through to the 'keeper does it for Tharanga, pushing forward and missing

Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 run first runs, as Tharanga pushes a fuller, inswinging delivery back in the air to Lee's left but he cannot get his outstretched hand there in time ... that ball swung back in off a length

Lee to Jayasuriya, 1 run nasty delivery, bouncing sharply off a length as Jayasuriya pushes forward outside off stump, it rears up off the seam at a sharp pace and he does well to keep it down in front of gully
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run short one on leg stump, forcing him up and defending to square leg
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run good ball, fuller just outside off stump and coming in, Tharanga drives and gets an inside-edge to the man at square leg
Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 wide wider one, back of a length and going away and the umpire does his thing

Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 run falls safe! Tharanga plays loosely at a short one and the ball balloons up in the air and drops safely to the right of Clarke, running across from point, they steal a single and the fielder hits the s
Bracken to Upul Tharanga, no run back of a length outside off stump, Tharanga shoulders arms
Bracken to Upul Tharanga, no run fuller one, as he looks for movement, it pitches wide and goes away
Bracken to Upul Tharanga, no run this one's on off stump, he gets in line and drives loosely to midwicket
Bracken to Upul Tharanga, 1 run shorter one, enough width for Tharanga to stand and open the face, running it wide of Clarke at gully this time for a single
Bracken to Jayasuriya, no run beaten, or did he pull the bat back? Bracken hits a good length, the ball straightens and sits up and Jayasuriya, pushing forward, manages to get out the line
Bracken to Jayasuriya, 1 run slower ball, fuller and swinging, Jayasuriya pushes off the front foot, tentatively, into the covers and they scamper a single
Lee to Jayasuriya, no run back of a length outside off, upright seam, he gets across and defends
Lee to Jayasuriya, no run chases a fuller one just outside off stump, with too much bottom hand, and drags it back to Lee's left
Lee to Jayasuriya, no run good change-up ball, slower and fuller, drawing him into the defensive
Lee to Jayasuriya, no run quick and shorter, rising and he gets Jayasuriya up on the toes, keeping it down nicely in front of point
Lee to Jayasuriya, no run back of a length, worked across Jayasuriya, who leaves this one be
Lee to Jayasuriya, no run back of a length outside off stump, he defends with an angled bat and the ball rolls towards square leg
Bracken to Upul Tharanga, no run short of a length, comes back into him and he defends to Clarke at point
Bracken to Upul Tharanga, 2 runs gets some width and he cuts into the ground, one bounce and just wide of point, Lee does the fielding and keeps them to two
Bracken to Upul Tharanga, no run back of a length and wide so he opts to let it go through
Bracken to Upul Tharanga, no run fuller in length, he gets to the pitch and drives straight to Symonds at cover
Bracken to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs but this time he finds the gap, driving through the covers and the quick outfield takes care of the rest, that was a good shot on the up, against the swing
Bracken to Upul Tharanga, no run back of a length, he gets across and runs it along the ground to gully
Lee to Jayasuriya, 1 run short and wide, he plays it in the air through the gap at gully for one
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run full just outside leg stump, swings down and raps him, no appeal as that was clearly doing too much
Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 run back of a length, seams back in but he gets right in line and pushes with a straight bat, calls for the sharp single immediately as Johnson is slow at mid-off
Lee to Jayasuriya, no run full on the stumps, he shuffles across the line and clips to midwicket
Lee to Jayasuriya, FOUR runs short, wide and he slashes uppishly over gully, one bounce and it beats a sliding third man, that was thrashed very hard

Bracken to Upul Tharanga, OUT edged and taken! Bracken strikes, pitching on a full length outside off stump and sucking Tharanga into a very loose drive from the crease, the late swing does the trick and Gilchrist takes the easi
Bracken to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run full on middle and off, swing on view and Jayawardene clips that uppishly through the gap at midwicket to get off the mark first ball
Bracken to Sangakkara, FOUR runs short one first up, Sangakkara pulls from outside off stump very hard and just over a leaping square leg fielder
Bracken to Sangakkara, 1 run fuller one but down the legs and he taps that into the gap at mid-on
Bracken to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run pitches outside leg, lifts into him, tucked towards short fine leg
Bracken to Sangakkara, 1 run short of a length, little too wide, thats a touch shot just wide of point
Lee to Sangakkara, no run too wide but Sangakkara mistimes his cut shot into the ground at point
Lee to Sangakkara, no run nasty bouncer, 141ks over middle and leg, gets Sangakkara ducking and there's a smile shared between batsman and bowler afterwards
Lee to Sangakkara, no run very full and wide outside off and he lets this one go through
Lee to Sangakkara, no run short of a length, he gets tall and guides it to Clarke at backward point
Lee to Sangakkara, FOUR runs ah thats a shot! Sangakkara gets to the pitch of a good-length delivery and creams that on the up through the covers to cue hysteria from the faithfuls in the crowd
Lee to Sangakkara, no run short and wide, cut hard but straight to backward point
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run causes some immediate trouble, straight and popping up to the outside edge as the batsman squares up behind it
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run on to the legs and tightens up the batsman who doesn't have the room he would like instead squeezing it in just into the leg-side
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run curved back round on leg, tucked down off the hips, more defensively than anything
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run stays over the wicket, pushes across the right hander at a questioning angle, answered with a leave on the back foot
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run nips back in from outside off, played back down with a straight bat
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run beats the outside edge with one which zooms at just under 147kph, Jayawardene lucky not to get any bat on it as he lashes a would-be off-drive at the ball
Lee to Sangakkara, no run stays over the wicket, pushes across the left hander

Lee to Sangakkara, FOUR runs outside off, Sangakkara moves outside and into the line of the ball, goes for the bosh over midwicket, takes a huge outside edge which goes over third man and nearly over the rope
Lee to Sangakkara, no run a tad fuller this time, goes across him but well wide enough to leave
Lee to Sangakkara, FOUR runs short on off and pulled from there just in front of square
Lee to Sangakkara, FOUR runs outside off and pulled hard from the bottom of the bat through midwicket
Lee to Sangakkara, FOUR runs ooh, dropped, but that was a hard chance, Sangakkara lashing a full-blooded cover drive just past Symonds whose leap resulted in him getting a fingertip there
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Jayawardene again struggles with a Johnson delivery, flashing forward and the ball flying past the edge
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide a non-contentious wide, barely within the marks outside off
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 3 runs outside off, room enough to drive through cover where Symonds stops the ball and Clarke returns from just inside the rope
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run left-armer to left hander, Sanga waits on line with off and places the ball to the left-side
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run worked off the legs to short midwicket
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run a huge boom away from his body at a possible wide that's not given
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run back on it now, tighter, defended off the back foot
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run up there on off, driven out to the cover
Hopes to Sangakkara, FOUR runs only a hint of width outside off and Sangakkara creams that off the back foot with a powerful cut through point
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run tightens him up with a full ball on the toes, defended on the front foot
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run driven out to mid-on for a quick single
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run a quick dab-and-run through
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run defended on the back foot
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run on off, played forward
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run a hint of swing back in to the right hander on leg, who waits and defends quietly
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT down the wicket, rocks back and edges through a would-be booming drive to a short one outside off, the ball cutting away off the seam
Johnson to Silva, no run pushed across him and he leaves it first up
Johnson to Silva, no run on off this time, perhaps a touch short of a good length but the batsman is taking no chances early and comes down to present a very straight bat
Johnson to Silva, no run driven forward this time
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run up there on off, defended on the front foot
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run played forward again
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run dabbed down off the back foot, pushed forward on the off side and they shuffle through a single
Hopes to Silva, no run outside off, a good length, and wisely left
Hopes to Silva, no run a hint of swing in the air as the ball lands on a good length, the batsman coming out and defended stoutly on the front foot
Hopes to Silva, no run pushed through on a good length again and left alone outside off
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run room outside off, stands tall, gets in the line and defends on the back foot to the covers
Johnson to Sangakkara, 2 runs on off, skews an inside edge that cuts back past the leg stump and on the way
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run outside off, swing away from the left hander, who dinks the ball out to poingt, where Clarke tidies up and wings it back in to prevent any thoughts of a single
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run outside off, only just, good length from Johnson forcing the batsman to defend
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run veering down leg, turned round through fine for easy runs
Johnson to Silva, 1 run width outside off, down on one knee and launches one without getting under it properly, through the covers
Hopes to Silva, 1 run outside off, enough width to be driven out to the covers
Hopes to Sangakkara, 2 runs outside off again, a patient shot, the batsman waiting and deliberately opening the face to run the ball down to third man
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run comes forward and defends on the front foot
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run right up there and they ease out a single
Hopes to Silva, 1 leg bye a huge shout for one that was likely to have gone down although the batsman shuffled across, the benefit of the doubt was given
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run short, on leg, and defended back down
Johnson to Silva, no run another muscular delivery, Johnson launching across the right ahnder who leaves it
Johnson to Silva, no run makes him play this time with one which pitches on a good length on off, forcing the defensive
Johnson to Silva, no run right up there and defended on the back foot
Johnson to Silva, no run wide across him, reaches out on a crouch to look to steer that to point, lets it go through in the end
Johnson to Silva, no run right across him on off, defended off the back foot to the gully region
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run stays over the wicket to the left hander, Sangakkara pushing hard to third man off one which just moved across him
Hopes to Silva, 1 run starts on off, nips back on to middle, and turned off the legs in front of square
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run on off, dabs one down into the covers and they run through, the pressure causing Symonds to fumble
Hopes to Silva, no run nipping back in from outside off to on off, the ball driven back out to the covers
Hopes to Silva, no run good length on off, defended into the covers on the front foot
Hopes to Silva, no run nipped back in from outside off, kept low and Silva did well to stab down on it
Bracken to Sangakkara, 1 run a quick single brings Silva on strike
Bracken to Silva, no run great ball across the right hander, slower ball pitching outside off and moving away, the batsman's forward defensive press in vain
Bracken to Silva, no run outside off, pushed into the covers on the front foot
Bracken to Silva, no run angled right in at the right hander, landing it on a perfectly tight length and forcing the forward defensive
Bracken to Silva, no run width outside off, cut hard to backward point and picked up immediately
Bracken to Silva, no run pushed to the covers for a single to end the over
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run right up there on off, defended on the front foot
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 leg bye walks across his stumps and yet there was no appeal for one which hit him on the pads
Hopes to Silva, no run cut hard to point off the back foot
Hopes to Silva, no run right up there and defended on the front foot
Hopes to Silva, 1 run outside off, played on the back foot to point
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run right up there on off, pushed to the covers
Bracken to Silva, no run up there and defended on the front foot
Bracken to Silva, 1 run on leg, turned round the theoretical corner for two

Bracken to Sangakkara, OUT no arguments about that one, a great delivery from Bracken that traps Sangakkara plumb in front of middle, the ball pitching back in and the batsman going to defend on the back foot
Bracken to Dilshan, 2 runs goes down on the front foot outside off and the ball pings off a sweep high and straight over the keeper, not where he was aiming it
Bracken to Dilshan, 1 wide wide down off
Bracken to Dilshan, no run right up there, that one left alone through
Bracken to Dilshan, no run slower ball dying on off, played back down
Hogg to Silva, 1 run drags it down so it's a half tracker, gets away with it, the ball pulled round through square without much power
Hogg to Dilshan, no run turned back in from outside off, defended down on the back foot
Hogg to Dilshan, 1 run on leg, down on one knee and paddle-sweeps to fine
Hogg to Silva, 1 run on leg again, looks to play it fine
Hogg to Dilshan, 1 run on off, waits to make room to cut through the covers off the back foot
Hogg to Silva, OUT Hogg strikes in his first over, the ball grips on off, straightens and takes the feather as Silva tries to defend on the back foot, Gilchrist pouching the sliver
Bracken to Dilshan, 3 runs pushed across the right hander who drives straight through mid-off
Bracken to Kapugedera, no run pushed across him, left alone through
Bracken to Kapugedera, OUT Hayden at first slip makes no mistake as the batsman goes for the booming drive away from the body as Bracken fires in another wicket-taking cutter
Bracken to Vaas, no run greets him with a slower ball outside off, left alone
Bracken to Vaas, no run wide outside off, driven back to the bowler who picks it up easily
Bracken to Vaas, 1 run nipped back in from outside off, and tucked neatly off the hips to fine leg
Hogg to Vaas, no run on off, played back down and out towards mid-on
Hogg to Vaas, no run outside off, driven out to mid-off
Hogg to Vaas, no run on middle and off, played back out to gully
Hogg to Vaas, no run quicker one, turns back in sharply to the batsman who just about gets some bat on it
Hogg to Vaas, no run fizzed past the left hander, turned a long way and got some good bounce through to Gilchrist
Hogg to Vaas, no run turned back in this time, played back down
Bracken to Dilshan, SIX runs awesome shot! Completely against the run of play Dilshan comes down the track and strikes a lofted drive straight, high and true over long-off and back into the crowd
Bracken to Dilshan, 1 run tries to repeat the shot but nearly holes out, the ball stopping just short of long-off
Bracken to Vaas, no run pushed into the covers
Bracken to Vaas, 1 run played forward this time
Bracken to Dilshan, OUT yet another cutter pays dividends, as Dilshan sends a leading edge out to long off where Lee sets himself and has a firm base for taking the catch
Bracken to Vaas, no run short ball, outside off, fended to point
Hogg to Malinga, no run right up ethere and defended on the back foot
Hogg to Malinga, no run on the front foot now
Hogg to Malinga, no run pushed past the outside edge
Hogg to Malinga, 1 run worked out to mid-on
Hogg to Vaas, 1 wide pushed very wide down leg
Hogg to Vaas, 1 run outside off, turns back in, swept out to deep square leg
Bracken to Vaas, no run on leg, looked to turn it to square
Bracken to Vaas, no run slower ball on off, the batsman comes forward and defends on the front foot
Bracken to Vaas, FOUR runs outside off and pulled hard in front of midwicket to bring up the 100
Bracken to Vaas, no run nipped back in from outside off, pushed into short midwicket
Bracken to Vaas, no run short outside off, played softly off the back foot to point
Bracken to Vaas, FOUR runs slower ball lifted right over mid-off and plugged just inside the rope, Johnson makes a vain dive and looks a bit silly, but has the decency to laugh about it afterwards
Hogg to Malinga, no run pitches outside off and turns right back in to the batsman who lets it hit him on the hip
Hogg to Malinga, no run looped up on off, defended on the front foot
Hogg to Malinga, 1 run pushed on to the back foot in front of off, defended
Hogg to Vaas, no run pitches just outside off and turns away from the left hander who's not deceived
Hogg to Vaas, no run defended forward
Lee to Malinga, no run nipped back in from just outside off to middle, defended on the back foot
Lee to Malinga, no run pushed down the line, shortish, Malinga lets it slide through

Lee to Malinga, OUT on off, driven off the inside edge out to mid-on and there's a call for a run-out at the non-striker's end. Malinga loses his bat as the ball comes in from Symonds, but has he made his ground? Tricky one, al
Lee to Vaas, no run short, on middle and leg, and turned round through midwicket
Lee to Vaas, 2 runs right up there on off, defended on the back foot into the covers
Lee to Vaas, no run defended this time
Hogg to Murali, 1 run on middle, turned back out to leg, and played off the pads to fine leg
Hogg to Vaas, no run turned away from the left hander who shoulders arms
Hogg to Vaas, 1 run hit high in the air over to deep midwicket but short of the man there
Hogg to Murali, 1 run on off, turned round in front of square, Murali collides with Hogg and the two have a good smile
Hogg to Vaas, no run rightu p there, defended on the front foot
Hogg to Vaas, FOUR runs outside off, pulled round through deep midwicket

Lee to Murali, OUT Lee sees that he's backing away and follows him outside leg, the ball dug out to the legs. A mix-up results as Ponting slides in at mid-on and crashes down the stumps with the ball still in his hand
Lee to Murali, (no ball) an overstep here
Lee to Murali, no run backed away from it but could not connect with an upper cut off the back foot
Lee to Murali, 1 run outside off and driven straight this time
Lee to MKDI Amerasinghe, no run full toss, stands on the back foot and drives to mid-on
Lee to MKDI Amerasinghe, no run right up there on off, driven out square to point
Lee to MKDI Amerasinghe, no run defended on the front foot in line with off
Hogg to Murali, no run outside off, tries to pull it to midwicket
Hogg to Murali, no run nipped back in from outside off, defended on the back foot
Hogg to Murali, 1 run worked into the leg-side this time
Hogg to MKDI Amerasinghe, 1 leg bye outside off, turned back in
Hogg to Murali, no run down the track, drives outside off to the covers
Hogg to Murali, 1 run big air on that one, pushed to midwicket
Bracken to Murali, no run too good, on off, moved away and was just too high for the off bail, Murali was nowhere near it
Bracken to Murali, SIX runs slower ball again, Murali gets right under the ball and drives it straight and over long-on
Bracken to Murali, OUT but he gets him this time, his best ODI figures and there's a five-for as the batsman goes to pull again over midwicket, but picks out the fielder instead
Thanks for joining me today, it's been entertaining if a little predictable from the early stages of Sri Lanka's innings.
"I thought our fielding tonight was very sharp," he adds, which is important as it had been under the spotlight.

Really good spell from Bracken, bowling the majority of his deliveries as slower balls to suit the track, excellent adjustment. Australia then have romped home with this win, more than doubling Sri Lanka's score thanks to some patient
Australia won by 128 runs
Player of the match is Nathan Bracken, AUS
